articles.title: Canadian economy lost 68000 jobs in May: StatCan - CTV News
articles.description:
1. Canadian economy lost 68000 jobs in May: StatCan  CTV News
  2. Alberta's unemployment rate in May the lowest since the start of the COVID-19 pandemic  Edmonton Journal
  3. B.C. jobs: Little change to unemployment rate in 2nd reflection of …
articles.content:
OTTAWA -- 
Statistics Canada says the economy lost 68,000 jobs in May as lockdowns to slow the spread of COVID-19 continued.
The losses marked the second consecutive month of declines after 207,000… [+4935 chars]
